website_summaries.verdict: While its noise-canceling feature and comfort level aren't quite on par with competing models from Bose and Sony, its sound measures up well and it's worth considering if you don't want to spend $300 or more on a noise-canceling headphone.
pros: The JBL Live 650BTNC has impressive sound and a comfortable fit while costing less than its premium rivals
The design seems sturdy and it folds up to fit in an included canvas pouch
It supports Google Assistant or Amazon Alexa with a button press
cons: The noise cancelation isn't as good as Sony's or Bose's

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones! Don't want to stop listening to my music with these on. Most of all- they arrived the next day! Sweetness!
customer_reviews.author: Poseidon

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I love using them when I travel through busy airports. Great noise cancellation, easy to carry and pack, reliable Bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: GREAT quality - blocks sound well & has great sound.  Perfect for travelers.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sister, a frequent business traveler who was OVER screaming kids on planes. She LOVES them. She says they almost entirely block noise and have great sound quality and battery life. She said she is just as happy with these as she would have been with Bose.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORKING DAY ONE !
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box volume controls not working, won`t power off or go into pairing mode. Tried a factory reset that also did not work. Clearly no quality control. Will not buy JBL products again.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Made my son happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift for my son he loves them said they are great on the plane
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, could be better
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good, but build quality is bad. Both sides of ear cup holders broke off after one month, would like to return them or get a coupon
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the money, excellent headphones. They sound good, controls are easy, and so far, they are durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Arrived defective. Has known issue where it won’t turn off
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I really like the wireless aspect for the over the ear headphones. Great quality all the way around!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It has good sound. Could be better but for the cost sounds good. Very comfortable very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: michael rak

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product, not as good with ANC. I do not recommend white, the inside cloth get super dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Yes

customer_reviews.title: Not loud and cutting off
customer_reviews.text: While listening to music it would get hot and cut off
customer_reviews.author: Erick scaperotta

customer_reviews.title: Buttons don’t work
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box the volume and skip buttons don’t do anything, regardless of the device I use it with, whether iPhone or desktop, regardless of whether I connect wirelessly or with the cable. They simply don’t work. The power button and noise reduction button do work and sound is decent, but it’s pretty bad if most buttons don’t work from day 1. Wouldn’t recommend obviously.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When they work, they're great...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are comfortable and sound great. However, after a few month they are unable to turn off. Even after factory resetting and shutting down the headset, they like to turn on and die in the middle of the night. As a result, whenever I want to use them, they have no charge.
customer_reviews.author: JBeck

customer_reviews.title: Good battery and sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good battery life and sound quality. The noise cancelling could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. JBL will not stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy JBL. They use a fixative on the earpads that lasts about a year to a year and a half. Then they are garbage. The picture is my headphones. I already fixed the left earpad then the right distintegrated. I contacted JBL and they will not stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Jake DeJong
